author: Mattias Bäcklund

changelog.release_notes: Added German language (eastern and western flavour)

- Add Spanish language
- Make changes to line length calculations to make better use of screen size

- Add a new 'small bold' text type to fit the Italian word 'quattro' on a single line.
- Minor fix for Dutch greetings
Fixed a bug that prevented older Pebble watches to receive configuration.

- Added italian language
- Fixed issue with bad UUID (sorry if your watchface was uninstalled)

- Added Dutch language
- Added configurable time offset
- Added translated Connection Lost messages
- Fixed issue where Connection Lost was reported too often

3.3 solves two bugs.
- Time was off by one hour between hh.57 and hh.59
- Language choice was reset every time the watchface restarted

Add configurable languages:
- Swedish
- English
- Norwegian

- Added configurable colors
- Buzz and message on loss of bluetooth connection
- Greeting message on startup
Den senaste versionen stödjer Pebble Time och inte minst Pebble Round med den nya upplösningen.
Compiled with SDK 2.0B7 and bumped app version number to 2.0.0

description:
Supports: English, Swedish, Norwegian, Italian, Spanish, German and Dutch
 
This watchface combines the easy to read fonts of Text Watch with the natural language of Fuzzy Time in several languages and colors.

Features:
 -Fuzzy time in natural language (five minute precision)
- Several languages to choose from (English, Swedish, Norwegian, Italian, Spanish, Dutch)
- Fully configurable colors
 - Vibrates and shows a message when phone connection is lost
 - Large and easy to read typeface
 - Configurable offset for the five minute precision
 - Nicely animated transitions

latest_release.release_notes: Added German language (eastern and western flavour)

title: Fuzzy Text Plus
